mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rating (rate_score, rate_content, rate_img, rate_date, reserve_id, loc_id, loc_name, address, charge_type, user_name, user_phone) VALUES (#{rate_score}, #{rate_content}, #{rate_img}, #{rate_date}, #{reserve_id}, #{loc_id}, #{loc_name}, #{address}, #{charge_type}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone})
